original: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā aniccāti pajānāti, anajjhositāti pajānāti, anabhinanditāti pajānāti.

original: So kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti, jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
analyzed: saḥ kāya pariyantikam vedanam vedayamānaḥ kāya pariyantikam vedanam vedayāmi iti pajānāti jīvita pariyantikam vedanam vedayamānaḥ jīvita pariyantikam vedanam vedayāmi iti pajānāti

original: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti, sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedāḥ uddham jīvita pariyādānāḥ idha iva sabba vedayitāni an abhinanditāni sītībhavissanti sarīrāni avasissanti iti pajānāti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso kumbhakārapākā uṇhaṁ kumbhaṁ uddharitvā same bhūmibhāge paṭisisseyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ kumbhakāra pākā uṇham kumbham uddharitvā same bhūmi bhāge paṭisisseyya

original: Tatra yāyaṁ usmā sā tattheva vūpasameyya, kapallāni avasisseyyuṁ.
analyzed: tatra yā ayam usmā sā tatthā iva vūpasameyya kapallāni

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya pariyantikam vedanam vedayamānaḥ kāya pariyantika

original: vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti, jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṁ
analyzed: vedanam vedayāmi iti jīvita pariyantikam vedanam vedayamānaḥ jīvita pariyantika
vedanam vedayāmi iti

original: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti, sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedāḥ uddham jīvita pariyādānāḥ idha iva sabba vedayitāni an abhinanditāni sītībhavissanti sarīrāni avasissanti iti pajānāti
tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyya apuññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyya āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho khīṇāsavaḥ bhikkhu puñña abhisaṅkhāram vā abhisaṅkhareyya apuñña abhisaṅkhāram vā abhisaṅkhareyya āneñja abhisaṅkhāram vā abhisaṅkhareyya ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana saṅkhāresu asati, saṅkhāranirodhā api nu kho viññāṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana saṅkhāresu asati saṅkhāra nirodhā api nu kho viññāṇam paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana viññāṇe asati, viññāṇanirodhā api nu kho nāmarūpaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana viññāṇe asati viññāṇa nirodhā api nu kho nāmarūpam paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana nāmarūpe asati, nāmarūpanirodhā api nu kho saḷāyatanaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana nāma rūpe asati nāma rūpa nirodhāḥ api nu kho saḷāyatanam paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana saḷāyatane asati, saḷāyatananirodhā api nu kho phasso paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana saṅgāyatane asati saṅgāyatana nirodhā api nu kho phassaḥ paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana phasse asati, phassanirodhā api nu kho vedanā paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana phasse asati phassa nirodhā api nu kho vedanā paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana vedanāya asati, vedanānirodhā api nu kho taṇhā paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana vedanāya asati vedanā nirodhā api nu kho taṇhā paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana taṇhāya asati, taṇhānirodhā api nu kho upādānaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana taṇhāya asati taṇhā nirodhā api nu kho upādānam paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana upādāne asati, upādānanirodhā api nu kho bhavo paññāyethā”ti.
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana upādāne asati upādāna nirodhā api nu kho bhavaḥ paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana bhave asati, bhavanirodhā api nu kho jāti paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana bhave asati bhava nirodhā api nu kho jāti paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sabbaso vā pana jātiyā asati, jātinirodhā api nu kho jarāmaraṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
analyzed: sabbaso vā pana jātiyāḥ asati jāti nirodhā api nu kho jarā maraṇam paññāyetha ati
naḥ heta bhante

original: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, evametaṁ, bhikkhave, netaṁ aññathā.

original: Saddahatha me taṁ, bhikkhave, adhimuccatha, nikkaṅkhā ettha hotha nibbicikicchā.
analyzed: saddahatha me ta bhikkhave adhimuccatha nikkaṅkhā ettha hotha nibbicikicchā

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dasannaṁ vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ vīsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ tiṁsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ cattārīsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ mahāaggikkhandho jaleyya.

original: Tatra puriso kālena kālaṁ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya.
analyzed: tatra purisaḥ kālena kālam sukkhāni ca iva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya

original: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahāaggikkhandho tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ jaleyya.
analyzed: evam hi saḥ bhikkhave mahā aggi khandhaḥ tad āhāraḥ tad upādānaḥ ciram dīgham addhānam jaleyya

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upādāniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave upādāniyesu dhammesu assāda anupassinaḥ viharataḥ taṇhā pavaḍḍhati
taṇhā paccayā upādānam pe
evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti

original: So taṁ rukkhaṁ mūle chindeyya, mūlaṁ chinditvā palikhaṇeyya, palikhaṇitvā mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷimattānipi.

original: So taṁ rukkhaṁ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṁ chindeyya, khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṁ chinditvā phāleyya, phāletvā sakalikaṁ sakalikaṁ kareyya, sakalikaṁ sakalikaṁ karitvā vātātape visoseyya;

original: vātātape visosetvā agginā ḍaheyya, agginā ḍahetvā masiṁ kareyya, masiṁ karitvā mahāvāte vā ophuṇeyya nadiyā vā sīghasotāya pavāheyya.

original: ‘yaṁ kho idaṁ anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhaṁ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṁ.
